home.beliefStatement_line2: Platinum Press is Iraq's first print house to offer a full quotation and order system online. Because your time matters.
home.beliefStatement_line3: From design to delivery, we provide comprehensive printing services that reflect your organization's identity and support your message.
home.noRecentProducts: No recent products to display at the moment.
home.noRecentWork: No recent work to display at the moment.

services.heroSubtitle: Crafting exceptional print materials with precision, quality, and innovation
services.sectionDescription: Discover our comprehensive range of printing services designed to meet all your needs, from small business cards to massive trade show displays.
services.ctaTitle: Ready to Start Your Next Printing Project?
services.ctaText: Contact our team today to discuss your printing needs and get a personalized quote for your project.

01.title: Digital Printing
01.description: Flexible printing for short runs — ideal for business cards, invoices, brochures, catalogs, menus, and quick promotional materials. Available in full-color or black & white, with professional-grade quality.

02.title: Offset Printing
02.description: Cost-effective for high-volume jobs without compromising on quality. Perfect for magazines, books, annual reports, bulk catalogs, and folded prints with consistent color accuracy.
02.homeDescription: The smart choice for large volumes

03.title: Advertising & Commercial Printing
03.description: Design and printing of indoor and outdoor banners, roll-ups, display stands, posters, and all types of stickers (transparent, matte, waterproof). Advanced printing on acrylic, glass, UV surfaces, and laser cutting available.
03.homeDescription: Strong visual presence that reflects your brand

04.title: Promotional & Gift Printing
04.description: High-quality printing on mugs, t-shirts, notebooks, bags, keychains, pens, and more. Multiple techniques available.
04.homeDescription: Custom gifts that strengthen client loyalty

05.title: Packaging & Finishing
05.description: Innovative packaging that adds value. Design and production of custom printed boxes, paper and plastic bags, and product labels in various shapes and sizes to fit every packaging need.

06.title: Creative Design
06.description: Visual identity that speaks your brand. Logo design and high-quality creative layouts for brochures, catalogs, ads, posters, and menus. Print-ready files are optimized for all types of printing machines.
06.homeDescription: Visual identity that speaks your brand

07.title: Office Stationery
07.description: Carbon and non-carbon invoice books, accounting forms, delivery and receipt books, archive folders, employee badges, business cards, and custom stamps.
07.homeDescription: Professional print solutions for everyday use

08.title: Exhibition & Event Branding
08.description: Complete solutions for booths & displays. Custom design and execution of exhibition booths, roll-ups, promotional tables, branded backgrounds, and full on-site setup with lighting and visual effects.

09.title: Custom Solutions
09.description: Free consultations to help you choose the best printing options for your budget. We handle special orders for schools, businesses, and government entities, with the flexibility to combine services into one integrated project.
09.homeDescription: Tailored execution that matches your vision

products.heroTitle: Premium Print Products, Tailored for Your Brand
products.heroSubtitle: Explore the full suite—from everyday business stationery to bespoke merchandise—each piece produced with precision, vibrant color, and unparalleled quality.

contact.heroSubtitle: We are here to help with all your printing needs. Reach out to us for inquiries, quotes, or support.
